p: The treatment of various tumor cell cultures with TA-1 volatile oil and TA-2 hydrolate for 48 h induces a concentration-dependent decreased cell number, but each cell line showed different sensitivity (Figure 3). Exposing different tumor cells to various concentrations of oily (Left panel) and soluble fractions (Right panel) of teucrium induced cell death in a concentration-dependent manner and significantly increased the number of apoptotic cells from 1% to âˆ¼100% and from 1% to 80%, respectively.
